CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK (TEXT(Language__c))),TEXT( Language__c), IF (NOT(ISBLANK(WebsiteLanguage__c)),WebsiteLanguage__c,'Empty')) +'_'+ IF (NOT(ISBLANK (TEXT(Country__c))),TEXT( Country__c), IF (NOT(ISBLANK(WebsiteCountry__c)),WebsiteCountry__c,'Empty'))
CustomField.label: Communication Locale
